sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getTableViewUIForm</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Get the sys_ui_form of a table view</description>
        <name>getTableViewUIForm</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getTableViewUIForm(tableName, view) {
	if (!view)
		return null;
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_form');
	if (tableName)
		gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
	else
		gr.addNullQuery('name');
	gr.addQuery('view', view);
	gr.query();
	return gr.next() ? gr.getUniqueValue() : null;
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-29 01:10:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>39c8543fc7323300cff9337bf4c260ef</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getTableViewUIForm</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Form" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.form">48054dc36de620100acb70b35343307f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39c8543fc7323300cff9337bf4c260ef</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-06 06:10:16</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>289</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
